summary:
(Mod requested by Yknuf)
Knock Knock allows you to knock a door (duh?).
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Mod Requested by Yknuf - Suggestions are accepted only by the requester.[/color]

[b]Introduction[/b]
It simply allows you to knock a door instead of waiting until morning or lockpicking even though you\'re playing as a good character.

[b]Other my mods[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36069]Player Journal - Write a pancake tale[/url]:
An in-game player journal which lets you write about anything you wish (in-game!)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34835]Post Office[/url]:
Adds a post office in Solitude, a working one which lets you send and receive letters!

[b]Translations[/b]
[url=http://tes-world.ru/load/plaginy_dlja_skyrim/prochee/stuk_v_dver/61-1-0-1108] Russian by Forestecho[/url]
author: Xilante
